byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: The Financial Times, the pink-hued chronicle of business news, may become the latest outpost of the Bloomberg L.P. media empire, as it weighs a bid for the newspaper, The New York Times reports. Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has been seen carrying The Financial Times in his daily stack of reading material, and he visited the paper’s London headquarters in October. When asked if he would buy the paper, Mr. Bloomberg answered only, “I buy it every day.” Read more »

headline.main: Bloomberg Is Said to Weigh Bid for The Financial Times
